name: Report tab to PDF
description: Prints Report tabs to PDF files for each record of the input data.
introductoryText:
## Report tab to PDF
#### This block will produce a PDF for each record of the upstream data containing a Report tab URL, saving the PDF files in a specified output folder, with filenames equal to the Report name + tab name + record index or to the specified optional name.
##### It requires Google Chrome app installed on your machine.
##### It requires Visokio "Omniprint" app, downloadable here for [Windows](https://visokio.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Omniscope-Evo-Omniprint.zip), [Mac](https://visokio.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Omniscope-Evo-Omniprint-macos.zip) and [Linux](https://visokio.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/Omniscope-Evo-Omniprint-linux.tar.gz).

options.name: googleChrome
options.title: Google Chrome app
options.description: Path to Google Chrome executable. On Mac, this is typically `"/Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome"` (you must include the quotes). On Linux, `/opt/google/chrome/chrome`.

options.name: fileName
options.title: PDF Output File names
options.description: The field containing the filenames to use, record by record

options.name: outputFolder
options.title: PDF Output folder
options.description: Where Omniscope will save the PDF files

options.name: pageWidth
options.title: Page Width (pixels)
options.description: Optional page width to override default A4 size or Report fixed size.

options.name: pageHeight
options.title: Page Height (pixels)
options.description: Optional page height to override default A4 size or Report fixed size.

options.name: chromePort
options.title: Chrome port
options.description: The debugging port on which Chrome will be listening to

options.name: chromeDelay
options.title: Chrome loading delay
options.description: Delay (ms) to allow Chrome loading the page before printing to PDF
